title: The Happy Life of a Poker-Faced Zombie King
author: 木采
synopsis: Ye Wei’an is a beautiful zombie king. Intelligent from the very beginning, he knows that humans will ultimately defeat the zombie virus. So, he builds a nest for himself deep in the mountains, far from the storms of the outside world, spending his days collecting only beautiful crystals. When humanity finally triumphs, he calmly watches himself melt away. Unexpectedly, one day, he transmigrates into…

title: Apocalypse Coding for Myself
author: 马户子君
synopsis: —A hilarious, sweet, and satisfying romp— Qi He, a game tester for twelve years, was a professional at exploiting bugs and pulling off outrageous moves. After dying suddenly from overwork, he transmigrated into an apocalyptic world. On his first day, he bound with a system and was informed that he was a cannon fodder character in this world. He had to play his role…

title: Cultivating Killer Plants [Post-Apocalyptic]
author: 唧唧喵
synopsis: When the apocalypse arrived, Cheng Zhiyu, who hadn’t awakened any supernatural abilities, bound a system with its own space. Under the system’s guidance, he began planting within the space—except… why were the things he grew becoming more and more unusual? One day, Cheng Zhiyu arrived at a large base. The people there, upon learning he had wood-type abilities, couldn’t help but look down on…

title: The Consequences of Saving the Wrong Antagonist
author: 凤羽涅
synopsis: Professor System has issued a mission: to rescue the gentle, kind and tragic protagonist shou of the novel “The Exceptional Furnace”.Song ‘Scholar-Tyrant’ Qingshi: “Don’t worry, Professor! I can definitely ensure the patient’s recovery!”In the Immortal Realm:Song Qingshi praised from the bottom of his heart: “My patient is the kindest and most beautiful little angel in the world.”Yue Wuhuan quietly washed the blood from his…

title: A Bystander, But Pregnant with the Evil God’s Child
author: 南辿星
synopsis: One-sentence Summary: Can a male mother also become the object of everyone’s obsession?

title: The Black Moonlight Only Wants Power
author: 元余
synopsis: One-line Synopsis: After being jilted three times, the black moonlight strikes back. Theme: Life is in your own hands.

title: The Great Witch Doctor Livestreams His Consultations!
author: 暮雨听眠
synopsis: Wu Heng, the most powerful witch doctor of ancient times, wakes up to find himself transmigrated into the body of the grandson of an elderly traditional Chinese medicine practitioner.Recalling how his father, who worked as a butler for a wealthy family, was kicked out by a ruthless CEO after indulging in too much gossip, ultimately leading to a destitute death, Wu Heng decides to…

title: Years After Substituting the Marriage
author: 宁夙
synopsis: Jiang Wanrou took her sister’s place to marry Lu Feng, the eldest son of the Duke’s mansion who was unable to walk. Because the marriage was not very honorable, she was cautious every day. She served her elders and managed the household, keeping the Duke’s mansion in perfect order. Even her moody husband, for the sake of their child, gave her the respect she…

title: My Boyfriend Is the Heartthrob, and I’m Just a Passerby
author: 橘子珩
synopsis: After gaining awareness, Ye Jishu realizes he is just a passerby in a harem novel where the protagonist shou is a magnet for obsessive lovers. This novel has Gong 1, Gong 2, Gong 3… and the list goes on, each of them seemingly infected with madness, falling deeply and uncontrollably in love with the protagonist shou. Constantly showing concern, forcing possession, secretly stalking… Every…

title: I Only Want Your Hugs
author: 仿生咩咩刀
synopsis: Because of touch starvation, Bai Chen had been single since birth. He was even rumored to be pretending to be noble and was actually a sea king who was a master at fishing. On the second day after he was blacklisted across the internet, the imperial crown prince, Xie Yilin, came to him and asked him to agree to a fake marriage. Facing the…

title: Stabilizing Madness
author: 有狐千岁
synopsis: Xu Qingran, originally an antagonist in an apocalyptic novel, finds himself pulled into a different interstellar world by a system after his death. In this new world, he is unloved by his biological father and stepmother, and his innocent stepbrother interferes with his relationships. He suffers abuse from a scoundrel lover, enduring a tumultuous journey before ultimately achieving a grand happy ending. The system…

title: Marriage by Imperial Decree
author: 其君折枝
synopsis: Xu Duan Yi is elegant and virtuous, born into a prestigious family. In the capital, countless noble young men wished to marry her. Xie Qing Ya, on the other hand, is a libertine and unrestrained. Though he is stunningly handsome, his family has fallen from grace, and he is seen as a good-for-nothing. No one expected that these two would end up together. When…

title: My Mom is a Amnesiac Heiress
author: 溯时
synopsis: Ji Ning is the female lead in the melodramatic story “I Lost My Memory After Running Away with a Child.” After giving birth to Zhu Zhu, she suffers a severe car accident and loses all her memories. Her daughter is also kidnapped and goes missing. Three years pass by. The Ji family exhausts all their resources and finally finds their long-lost little miss. The…

title: After the Villain Heard the Housekeeper’s Voice
author: 西兰树
synopsis: Jing Yi was a penniless nobody, struggling to make ends meet. After an unexpected accident, he was transmigrated into a series of tragic romance novels, becoming the head butler in a wealthy family. A job with room and board included. Thinking he could finally live a good life, Jing Yi soon discovers that the young masters of the family are all extreme romantics. They…

title: When a Socially Anxious Person Becomes a Fake Young Master of a Rich Family
author: 醒灯
synopsis: Outwardly cold but inwardly soft-hearted beauty with social anxiety (receptive) x possessive and obsessive tyrannical dog-like aggressive (dominant) Cen Wu accidentally transmigrates into a power-up fantasy novel, becoming the fake young master, a cannon fodder character who occupies a place that doesn’t belong to him. The cannon fodder, knowing he is a fake, behaves arrogantly and spoiled, fighting with his CEO brother over the…

title: Who Would Be Cannon Fodder After Awakening
author: 八爷党
synopsis: Ye Mingzhao has awakened. He has learned that he is the villainous fake son in a novel about a true and false heir. Adopted by a wealthy family since childhood, he becomes dissatisfied when the true heir returns to the family. He resorts to framing and slandering the true heir, stirring up conflicts, and ultimately succeeds in causing the true heir’s death. The true…

title: A Salted Fish with a Rebellious Spirit
author: 一世华裳
synopsis: Xing Shi unexpectedly transmigrated to a magical world, where life became extremely miserable. But luck was on his side. One day, he opened his eyes to find himself back in a normal human society. Tearfully, he decided to enjoy life to the fullest. However, just then, a voice echoed in his mind. [System 99, successfully bound to host.] Fu Xiu Ning suddenly gained the ability…

title: Rebirth of a Majestic Empress
author: 春未绿
synopsis: Zheng Huiyin and her elder sister Zheng Deyin are both reborn. In their previous life, Zheng Huiyin married the puppet crown prince as his concubine, while her sister Zheng Deyin married a powerful prince as his legitimate wife. Everyone praised her sister for making a great match—or so it seemed. Who would have thought that Zheng Huiyin would not only make the crown prince…

title: The Sick Beauty Just Wants to Quietly Stay Alive
author: 旭小岩
synopsis: Shen Yan, the eldest son of the Shen family, is cold and aloof, exuding a noble aura. However, there is a striking red mole between his brows, giving him a look that is both sensual and pure. In his previous life, he died from the torment of illness. When he woke up again, he realized he had been transported into the body of an…

title: The First Spirit Rune Master
author: 吱吱复吱吱
synopsis: A forbidden spell magician transmigrated into the useless fifth prince, Cang Cheng, of the Cang Lan Star Domain. Barely an adult, he was appointed as the planetary governor of the border planet, Luori Star. This was no different from being exiled to the border. “Will this fifth prince die on the border planet?” “For a useless prince like him, I’d be grateful if he…
